result:
## Bug Found! 🐛

Successfully discovered a bug in `tokenizers.tools.visualizer`:

**Bug**: The `calculate_label_colors` method generates malformed HSL color strings missing a closing parenthesis at line 178 of `/root/hypothesis-llm/envs/tokenizers_env/lib/python3.13/site-packages/tokenizers/tools/visualizer.py`

**Impact**: This causes CSS parsing errors when the visualization HTML is rendered, breaking the annotation color display feature.

**Bug report saved**: `bug_report_tokenizers_tools_visualizer_2025-08-18_04-33_k3x9.md`

The property-based testing approach successfully identified this contract violation where the generated HSL format doesn't match the CSS specification. ✅

tool_input.command: source /root/hypothesis-llm/envs/tokenizers_env/bin/activate && python -c "import tokenizers.tools; print('success - treating as module')"
tool_input.description: Activate virtual environment and check tokenizers.tools
Use tokenizers_env python to check module
Use python3 from venv to check tokenizers.tools
Find the HSL format line in source
